adrFormatAddress: 3656 Broadway, New York, NY 10031-2520, USA

originalText.text: Can be hit or miss. They are good with basic things like fast fashion items not meant for the washing machine/dryer. Gave them one if my memory foam pillows to clean and it came back dirty af. Fabric also piling. Definitely not putting my face on this. Will call ASAP to report and rectify.

originalText.text: Worst cleaners ever! They ruined 2 dresses and a blouse. I guess they are fine if your dropping off button down shirts, but they will ruin your silks and any delicate fabrics. No accountability either.

text.text: Worst cleaners ever! They ruined 2 dresses and a blouse. I guess they are fine if your dropping off button down shirts, but they will ruin your silks and any delicate fabrics. No accountability either.

originalText.text: Nordic cleaners is a neighborhood institution.  They do an amazing job and always provide service with a smile.  I couldn’t recommend them more enthusiastically.

text.text: Nordic cleaners is a neighborhood institution.  They do an amazing job and always provide service with a smile.  I couldn’t recommend them more enthusiastically.

originalText.text: Garbage cleaners! They let the rats dance on your clothes. And they don’t wash their hands before they fold all your clothes after eating food. Horrendous attitude. Garbage smell inside. Really unappreciative. Don’t come here! Already have at-home machines and other services to not go here. Trash jobs they really do. These people make trash faces when they think they are better than you.

originalText.text: Be very careful with this place. They mislead customers into thinking that they can handle cleaning. In fact, they RUIN your clothes because they cannot clean! I gave them pants with a small wine stain that they returned to me with a BIGGER soap stain that they cannot remove. The store then tried to wriggle their way out of responsibility... Waste of time, money, and soap too! STAY AWAY if you like your clothes.
